shareWithUs.name: ShareWithUs
shareWithUs.desc: A full-stack app for lending & borrowing items within a community. Built with the MERN stack.

shopMate.name: ShopMate
shopMate.desc: A smart shopping list app built with TypeScript, React (Vite), and Firebase. It helps users organize groceries, share lists, and stay synchronized in real-time.

cryptoApp.name: Crypto-App
cryptoApp.desc: A crypto dashboard built with React & CoinGecko API. Includes live search, charts, and local storage.

weatherApp.name: Weather-App
weatherApp.desc: An interactive weather app that shows current weather and a 5-day forecast for any city worldwide.

list.description: During my journey at HackYourFuture, I collaborated on multiple full-stack projects using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I also gained hands-on experience in Agile workflows and presented our final project, ShareWithUs.

journey.title: My Journey ðŸš€
journey.text: From 2015 to 2021, I worked as an Accountant in Iran. During these six years, I gained deep expertise in financial management, bookkeeping, and preparing accurate reports. These experiences shaped my ability to think critically, stay organized, and solve problems logically, skills I now apply to my career in software development.
